question: The booklet “Safe online learning in the times of COVID-19” has been prepared by NCERT in collaboration with which global organisation?
explanation:
Union Human Resource Development Minister Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank launched the information booklet titled 'Safe online learning in the times of COVID-19'.
The booklet, which has been jointly developed by NCERT and UNESCO, aims to raise awareness in students and teachers about safe online environment. This has been launched at the backdrop of several children and teachers being actively engaged in digital learning platforms amid the lockdown due to Covid-19.
